Utilities for icu_tbl objects

tbl_utils.Rd

Utilities for icu_tbl objects

# S3 method for id_meta
rename_cols(x, new, old, ...)

# S3 method for tbl_index
rename_cols(x, new, old, ...)

# S3 method for tbl_id
rename_cols(x, new, old, ...)

# S3 method for ts_meta
rename_cols(x, new, old, ...)

rm_cols(x, cols, ...)

# S3 method for data.table
rm_cols(x, cols, ...)

rename_cols(x, new, old = colnames(x), ...)

# S3 method for data.table
rename_cols(x, new, old = colnames(x), ...)

# S3 method for icu_tbl
rm_cols(x, cols, ...)

# S3 method for icu_tbl
rename_cols(x, new, old = colnames(x), skip_absent = FALSE, ...)

rbind_lst(x, ...)

rm_na(x, cols = data_cols(x), mode = c("all", "any"))

unmerge(x, col_groups = as.list(data_cols(x)), by = meta_cols(x), na_rm = TRUE)

dt_gforce(
  x,
  fun = c("mean", "median", "min", "max", "sum", "prod", "var", "sd", "first", "last"),
  by = meta_cols(x),
  cols = data_cols(x),
  na_rm = !fun %in% c("first", "last")
)

is_unique(x, ...)

# S3 method for default
is_unique(x, ...)

make_unique(x, expr, fun, ...)

make_unique_quo(x, expr, by = meta_cols(x), cols = data_cols(x), ...)

Arguments

x

Object to operate on
new

New column names
old

Column names to be replaces by the ones specified as new
...

Generic consistency
cols

Column names of columns to consider
skip_absent

Silently ignore absent columns in old (along with their corresponding replacements in new)
mode

Switch between all where all entries of a row have to be missing (for the selected columns) or any, where a single missing entry suffices
col_groups

A list of character vectors defining the grouping of non-by columns
by

Columns that will be present in every one of the resulting tables
na_rm

Logical flag indicating whether to remove rows that have all missing entries in the respective col_groups group
fun

Function name (as string) to apply over groups
expr

Expression to apply over groups

Contents
